mutants.code:
def insertion_sort_step(arr, n):
    t = arr[n - 1]
    k = n + 2
    while k >= 0 and t < arr[k]:
        arr[k + 1] = arr[k]
        print(' '.join(map(str, arr)))
        k -= 1
    arr[k + 1] = t
    print(' '.join(map(str, arr)))
